column4: Anybody knows how well it works if a package depends on the lsb package as the sole dependency?  With "apt-get install lsb", I got "lsb: Depends: lsb-core but it is not going to be installed", ....  That doesn't seem like user-friendly at all if my package depends on lsb. Some lsb's dependencies seem to conflicts with lsb itself, but I'm not entirely sure.
when I sudo apt-get install lsb it installs all of the dependencies with it...
try doing sudo apt-get remove lsb && sudo apt-get autoremove then try installing the lsb package again...
I just enable all the repositories :)
